author: Mike Allen
title: Republicans see more hurdles for Trump as coronavirus crisis drags on
description: Republicans are increasingly concerned not only about President Trump’s daily briefings but also his broader plan to ease the nation out of the virus crisis and back to work. This concern is acute — and spreading. Why it matters: Trump can easily address the …
content:
Republicans are increasingly concerned not only about President Trumps daily briefings but also his broader plan to ease the nation out of the virus crisis and back to work. This concern is acute and spreading.
